vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Νυμφᾶς, -ᾶ, ὁ (WH, R, mg., Νύμφα, which see),
Nymphas: Col.4:15, R, txt. (cf. ICC, Lft., in l).†
Νύμφα (Rec., R, txt., Νυμφᾶς, which see), -ης, ἡ, Nympha (see M, Pr., 48): Col.4:15, WH, R, mg.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Col.4.15
§ Nympha
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
寧法 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "新郎"
一個富有且熱心的老底嘉基督徒 #西 4:15|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
宁法 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "新郎"
一个富有且热心的老底嘉基督徒 #西 4:15|
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Nim-pha hay Nympha. Cơ đốc nhân (nam hay nữ) mà nhà của bà chào đón hội thánh.
